sections.instructor: Ensign, Caitlin, Advisory: ENGL-C1000 or equivalent Note: Students who have successfully completed BIOSC-102 should not enroll in BIOSC-101. Students who have successfully completed BIOSC-102 will not receive credit for BIOSC-101. Note: 100% online course - no scheduled  meetings. This course may use exam proctoring software to administer exams. Access to a computer with audio and video capability is required. Instruction will be provided through the college learning management system Canvas. On the course start date, log into Canvas, www.dvc.edu/online to begin.

Rush, Andrew, Advisory: ENGL-C1000 or equivalent Note: Students who have successfully completed BIOSC-102 should not enroll in BIOSC-101. Students who have successfully completed BIOSC-102 will not receive credit for BIOSC-101. Note: 100% online course with required online meetings through  Zoom, Mondays and Wednesdays, 12:45-2:10pm.Instruction will be provided through the college learning management system Canvas and Zoom software. Access to a computer with audio and video capability is required. On the course start date, log into Canvas, www.dvc.edu/online to begin.
